verses.name: Hebrews 11:32
verses.text: And what shall I more say? for the time would fail me to tell of Gedeon, and of Barak, and of Samson, and of Jephthae; of David also, and Samuel, and of the prophets:

verses.name: Hebrews 11:33
verses.text: Who through faith subdued kingdoms, wrought righteousness, obtained promises, stopped the mouths of lions,

verses.name: Hebrews 11:34
verses.text: Quenched the violence of fire, escaped the edge of the sword, out of weakness were made strong, waxed valiant in fight, turned to flight the armies of the aliens.

verses.name: Hebrews 11:35
verses.text: Women received their dead raised to life again: and others were tortured, not accepting deliverance; that they might obtain a better resurrection:
